name: RegonAPI MCP Server
description: Model Context Protocol server for accessing Polish GUS REGON database - comprehensive business entity information system

tools.name: regon_search_by_nip
tools.description: Search for Polish business entities by NIP (Tax Identification Number). Returns comprehensive company information including registration details, address, and business classification.

nip.description: Polish NIP (Tax Identification Number) - 10 digits, hyphens optional

tools.name: regon_search_by_regon
tools.description: Search for Polish business entities by REGON number (9 or 14 digits). Returns detailed company information from the national business registry.

tools.name: regon_search_by_krs
tools.description: Search for Polish companies by KRS (National Court Register) number. Returns legal entity information from court records.

tools.name: regon_search_multiple_nips
tools.description: Search for multiple Polish companies by NIP numbers in a single request. Efficient for bulk lookups.

tools.name: regon_search_multiple_regons9
tools.description: Search for multiple Polish companies by 9-digit REGON numbers in a single request. Optimized for bulk operations.

tools.name: regon_search_multiple_krs
tools.description: Search for multiple Polish companies by KRS numbers in a single request. Efficient for processing multiple court registered entities.

tools.name: regon_get_full_report
tools.description: Get detailed report for a company by REGON number. Provides comprehensive business information including financial data and operational details.

tools.name: regon_get_service_status
tools.description: Check the status of the REGON service. Returns service availability and health information.

tools.name: regon_get_data_status
tools.description: Get information about data status and last update from the REGON database.

tools.name: regon_get_last_error_code
tools.description: Get the last error code from the REGON service for troubleshooting.

tools.name: regon_get_last_error_message
tools.description: Get the last error message from the REGON service for detailed error information.

tools.name: regon_get_session_status
tools.description: Check the current session status with the REGON API service.

tools.name: regon_get_available_operations
tools.description: Get list of available operations from the REGON service for capability discovery.
